name: Hazy Monochrome Wand
description:
It is a log light side scroll action that controls the tempo freely.

Manipulate a magic wand that has lost its memory and proceed through a randomly connected map with numerous enemies and vicious traps.

Comfortable and unique action

Pathetic actions such as "shot", "dash", and "jump" include actions such as "stagnation of time", "reversal of time", and "explosion magic".

time manipulation

Clearing the game is not easy, but slowing it down gives you the freedom to attack and avoid.

If there is any inconvenience, we can rewind the time.
Let's pretend we didn't suffer any damage!
